commons_config: cid int unsigned not null unique auto_increment primary key
access_type tinyint default 0 comment '0 = always visible, 1 = custom rules in commons_custom_access'
commons_custom_access: cid int unsigned not null unique references commons_config (cid) on delete cascade on update cascade
rule tinyint comment '0 = no rule applied, 1 = visible by default & exclusion, 2 = hidden by default & inclusion'
regions: rid int unsigned not null unique auto_increment primary key
item_name varchar(200) not null references commons_config (element_name) on update cascade on delete cascade
show_title boolean not null default true
